TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 1, pp. 253
TEI.2.document_title: John Rice Jones to Stephen F. Austin, 10-01-1815

barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 1, pp. 253

div1.p: Please to pay Mr Benjn Elliott nine Dollars and twenty five Cents, which I will credit on your Ace bill to me.—1st Octr. 1815
Mr Stephen F Austin—-Mine a Burton
